Tell me more about your mother.
Well, my mother is very kind and generous.
She's always done so much for me and my brother.
She sounds like a great mother. What about your father?
He's very kind, but he is always very busy.
I see. What about your brother? What is he like?
Oh, he's very easygoing, not like me. We're so different.
He is kind of a troublemaker.
Yes, I have three cousins on my mother's side, and four on my father's side.
Yes, we practically grew up together.
